item.title: New vs Re-new
item.description: Ultimately, using a professional sharpening service saves more money in the long run considering that paying double for the expensive blades doesnâ€™t result in a doubling of the time their edges stay sharp. Buy quality tools, have them maintained regurly and your blades will last for years.
